zadolzhennost-v-polzu-ooo-vesna: On 31.07.2025, debt in favor of Spring LLC is $11,677.00
odinnadcat-tysyach-shestsot-semdesyat-se: (Eleven thousand six hundred seventy-seven dollars 00 cents)
vyberite-yacheiku-dlya-vvoda-formuly: Select a formula for entering formula
vyberite-yacheiku-v-kotoruyu-budete-vvod: Select the cell in which you will enter the formula.
nachnite-vvodit-formulu-v-etu-yacheiku: Start entering the formula into this cell
nachnite-vvodit-formulu-v-yacheiku: Start entering the formula into the cell
vvedite-nachalo-formuly: Enter the beginning of the formula.
kliknite-po-yacheike-s-dannymi-dlya-srav: Click on the data cell for comparison or enter its address into the formula.
prodolzhite-redaktirovanie-formuly: Continue the editing of the formula
dobavte-razdelitel-v-formulu: Add the separator to the formula.
vydelite-ili-vvedite-diapazon-dlya-poisk: Select or enter the search range
vyberite-diapazon-dlya-poiska: Select the range for searching or enter the addresses of the initial and final cells of the range in the formula.
zakrepite-diapazon-poiska-v-formule: Fasten the search range in the formula
zakrepite-adresa-yacheek-diapazona-poisk: Fasten the addresses of the searches range (manually or by pressing F4 while in the input field).
dobavte-cherez-razdelitel-nomer-stolbca-: Add (via the separator) column number to the formula.
dobavte-cherez-razdelitel-znachenie-inte: Add (via the separator) the value of interval viewing to the formula.
zakonchite-redaktirovanie-formuly: Finish the editing of the formula
zakroite-skobku: Close the bracket after the last formula value and press Enter.
rastyanite-yacheiku-s-rezultatom-vniz-ch: Stretch the cell with a downstone to see all the data
yacheika-s-rezultatami-rastyanuta: The cell with the results is stretched.
nuzhno-rastyanut-yacheiku-na-vysotu-vsek: You need to stretch the cell to the height of all lines with data.
eshyo-raz-otredaktiruite-yacheiku-s-form: Edit the cell with the formula again
kliknite-po-yacheike-s-formuloi-chtoby-d: Click on a cell with a formula to add columns subtracting.
dopolnite-formulu-adresom-stolbca-dlya-v: Complete the formula with the address of the column for subtraction
vyberite-stolbec-to-substract: Choose a column, the data of which must be subtracted from the previous results, or add the column address to the formula manually, then click Enter.
rastyanite-yacheiku-s-rezultatami-eshyo-: Stretch the cell with the results again
rastyanite-yacheiku-s-rezultatom-vniz-es: Stretch the cell with the result again to update all the data.
vvedeno-nachalo-formuly: The beginning of the formula was entered.
ozhidaetsya-vvod-formuly: The entry of the formula is expected.
formuly-v-excel-nachinayutsya-so-znaka-z: Formulas in Excel start with the sign "=", followed by a short name of the function and the opening bracket.
ozhidaetsya-vvod-razdelitelya: The input of the separator is expected.
ozhidaetsya-vvod-adres-iskhodnogo-stolbc: The address of the source column is expected to enter.
ozhidaetsya-vvod-diapazona-yacheek: The mash range is expected (the address of the initial and final cells through the colon).
dobavte-znaki-dollara-vokrug-adresov: Add the signs of the dollar around the addresses of the columns in the inserted range.
vvedeno-znachenie-intervalnogo-prosmotra: The value of interval viewing was entered:
vvedite-znachenie-intervalnogo-prosmotra: Enter the value of interval viewing
zavershyon-vvod-formuly-teper-nazhmite-e:
The input of the formula is completed. 
Now click Enter.
vvedyon-adres-stolbca-dlya-vychitaniya: The address of the column for subtracting was entered:
ozhidaetsya-vvod-znaka-minus-i-adresa-st: The entry of the “minus” sign and the address of the column, the values of which must be subtracted from the results of the formula.
zavershyon-vvod-znachenie-formuly:
The input is completed. 
Formula value:
tekst-podskazki-dlya-dannogo-shaga: Text of a hint for a given step
